title: Bug 102436: Date/time value not stored correctly in report design
description: Bug 102436: Date/time value not stored correctly in report design. An invalid date/time string (which does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format) should have been rejected.
OB: When entering an invalid date/time string in the report design, the system does not reject it and stores it as is.
EB: (2) The date value should have been validated by the UI or Model before storing it in the report design.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the report design interface.
2. Enter an invalid date/time string in any date/time field.
3. Save the report.
4. Verify that the invalid date/time value is stored instead of being rejected.
